Play.Header: KC elects to Receive, and NO elects to defend the South goal.
6-T.Morstead kicks 72 yards from NO 35 to KC -7. 20-S.Draughn to KC 16 for 23 yards (54-W.Herring).
Kansas City Chiefs at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:57)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:57) 7-M.Cassel pass short right to 22-D.McCluster to KC 19 for 3 yards (33-J.Greer). New Orleans challenged the runner was down by contact ruling, and the play was REVERSED. 7-M.Cassel pass short right to 22-D.McCluster to KC 19 for 3 yards. FUMBLES, RECOVERED by NO-52-J.Casillas at KC 19. KC-22-D.McCluster was injured during the play. He is Out. McCluster fell and appeared to injure his wrist, fumbling the ball. New Orleans #52 J.Casillas recovered and ran into the endzone for a TOUCHDOWN. Referee Don King ruled there was an inadvertent whistle stopping the play. The Saints were awarded possession at the spot of the recovery, first down.
